description: The initiative aims to enhance the sustainability and competitiveness of banana exports by uniting various producer associations. Established in 2020, it focuses on advocacy, regulatory compliance, and improving conditions for small producers. The cluster engages in dialogue with government entities and international organizations, promoting organic practices and addressing challenges like climate change and pest management. By fostering collaboration among stakeholders, it seeks to maintain Ecuador's position as a leading banana exporter globally.
name: Cluster Bananero
